method.name: KeyHash
method.comment: Get Signature KeyHash example ggw+21Mf6Fedr0lwKTx36lquaYk= Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Signature KeyHASH: " & check.KeyHash)

method.name: CertificateName
method.comment: Get CartificatName example ELM Agent Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Certificate Name: " & check.CertificateName)

method.name: getPackageName
method.comment: GetPackageName example get com.devil.app.test Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Name APK: " & check.getPackageName)

method.name: md5
method.comment: Get Signature md5 fingerprint example ce916251b369d91049d9dd36323890a3 Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Signature md5 fingerprint: " & check.md5 )

method.name: CertificateGetSerialNumber
method.comment: Get CartificatGetSerialNumber example Serial Number: 15434793569865480918 Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Certificate Vendor: " & check.CertificateGetSerialNumber)

method.name: sha1
method.comment: Get Signature sha1 fingerprint example 826ahedb531ee8579daf4970293c77ea5aae6989 Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Signature sha1 fingerprint: " & check.sha1 )

method.name: CertificateSubject
method.comment: Get CartificatSubject example OID.1.2.840.113549.1.9.1=#1616686E64726F69642E6F734073616D73756E672E636F6D CN=Samsung Cert, OU=DMC, O=Samsung Corporation, L=Suwon City, ST=South Korea, C=KR Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Certificate Vendor: " & check.CertificateSubject)

method.name: CertificateVendor
method.comment: Get CartificatVendor example com.sec.esdk.elm Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Certificate Vendor: " & check.CertificateVendor)

method.name: getPackageVersionCode
method.comment: GetPackageVersionCode example get #VersionCode: 1 Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("VersionCode APK: " & check.getPackageVersionCode)

method.name: getPackageVersionName
method.comment: GetPackageVersionName example get #VersionName: 1.0 Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("VersionName APK: " & check.getPackageVersionName)

method.name: CertificateIssuer
method.comment: Get CartificatIssuer example OID.1.2.840.113549.1.9.1=#1616616E67726F69642E6F734073616D73756E672E636F6D, CN=Samsung Cert, OU=DMC, O=Samsung Corporation, L=Suwon City, ST=South Korea, C=KR Example: Dim check As CheckSignature Log("Certificate Vendor: " & check.CertificateIssuer)
